publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5060 Linda Fabiani: Skillbuild 2009, Congratulations to National Construction College Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the National Construction College Scotland for its success at the recent Skillbuild 2009 competition held at South Lanarkshire College, with particular congratulations to Mark Doris, winner of the gold medal for reinforced bitumen membrane roofing and Stephen Ferguson and Graeme Highlands, winners of the gold and silver medals respectively for roof sheeting and cladding.
S3M-5060 Skillbuild 2009, Congratulations to National Construction College Scotland (lodged on 27 October 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-5060 Linda Fabiani: Skillbuild 2009, Congratulations to National Construction College Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the National Construction College Scotland for its success at the recent Skillbuild 2009 competition held at South Lanarkshire College, with particular congratulations to Mark Doris, winner of the gold medal for reinforced bitumen membrane roofing and Stephen Ferguson and Graeme Highlands, winners of the gold and silver medals respectively for roof sheeting and cladding. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Alasdair Allan*, Aileen Campbell*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, Bob Doris*
S3M-5060 Skillbuild 2009, Congratulations to National Construction College Scotland (lodged on 27 October 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-5060 Skillbuild 2009, Congratulations to National Construction College Scotland (lodged on 27 October 2009) Gil Paterson*, Robin Harper*
S3M-5060 Skillbuild 2009, Congratulations to National Construction College Scotland (lodged on 27 October 2009) Christina McKelvie*
S3M-5060 Skillbuild 2009, Congratulations to National Construction College Scotland (lodged on 27 October 2009) Anne McLaughlin*
